result.execSummary:
The defendant Ricky Lee Price was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Ignition Interlock Device Tampering/Failure to Install, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 347.413(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
Defendant is entitled to Good Time Credit and Huber Privileges.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

ADDRESS INFO for Ricky Lee Price
Current: N4199 State Rd 49, Poy Sippi, WI 54967 United States  (Effective: 04-08-2016)
Prior: W1322 County Road H, Pine River, WI 54965

Case called @ 1:57 p.m. Defendant Ricky Lee Price in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. DE was previously told by SPD that he is not eligible for SPD services. DE waives his right to counsel to speak with ADA Anderson about possible resolution. Case recalled @ 2:01 p.m. The parties have reached an agreement.   Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea: Ct 2 - NC.  Court accepts plea and enters JOC. Ct 1 - DRI. Sentencing argument by ADA Anderson. Statement by DE. Court orders: 8 days WC Jail - Huber, GT, 3 days CFTS - Sentence to commence by no later than 1-29-2016, Costs w/ 60 DTP or PP. Appeal rights given.
Status conference at 01-22-2016 02:00 pm

Case called @ 3:51 p.m. Defendant Ricky Lee Price in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has called SPD and has not yet confirmed eligibility.  Status conference scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference at 01-08-2016 03:45 pm

11:15 am case called. Defendant Ricky Lee Price in court.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Statement by ADA Anderson. Statement by Defendant-regarding offer extended by State. Court questions defendant regarding counsel-defendant wishes to have counsel.  Status conference scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 03:45 pm.
Status conference at 12-29-2015 10:45 am

The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician.   No operation of any motor vehicles without a valid driver's license.

10:34 am. Defendant Ricky Lee Price in court, in custody, appears via video.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court goes over matter on calendar for today. Court questions defendant regarding non-appearance. Statement by ADA Anderson. Court questions defendant regarding counsel. Defendant states he is currently employed and requests a court appointed attorney. 10:40 am case re-called-same appearances. Offer has been extended to the defendant and defendant requests to have time to think about the offer.  Status conference scheduled for December 29, 2015 at 10:45 am.
In WC Jail
Voluntary appearance at 12-15-2015 10:30 am
from DE requesting voluntary appearance - Granted by the court, warrant will remain until hearing

11:54 am case called. Defendant Ricky Lee Price not in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Based on non-appearance, court authorizes a warrant-State of Wisconsin. Bond forfeited.
Status conference at 12-03-2015 11:50 am

The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician.  No operation of any motor vehicles whatsoever.
Defendant and Attorney Szilagyi appear via video.

Case called @ 1:14 p.m. Defendant Ricky Lee Price in court, in custody, appears via video with attorney Ben Szilagyi.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel. Defendant will not be represented by SPD if released from custody. DA Blader requesting cash bond. Atty Szilagyi requesting lower cash bond or signature bond. Court orders $500 Cash Bond.  NGP entered.   STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Status conference scheduled for December 3, 2015 at 11:50 am.
